full_summary:
**Government Announcement**
========================

**High Voltage Distribution System Divestiture**
------------------------------------------

**Prospectus Reference**
------------------------

### WS3749867991

**Tender Notice**
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting interested bidders to submit a proposal for the High Voltage Distribution System Divestiture tender.

**Service Offered**
-----------------

**UNSPSC Classification:** 72000000 Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services

**Service Description:** The PSPC is seeking bid proposals for the High Voltage Distribution System Divestiture.

**Contract Information**
---------------------

**Contract Start Date:** 2022-12-12

**Contract End Date:** 2023-12-25

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

**National Capital Region (NCR)**

**Government Entity Information**
---------------------------------

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
**Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada**

**Contact Information**
----------------------

**Contact Person:** Nabil Boujenoui (SPAC/PSPC)

**Email:** [nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Supporting Documents**
-------------------------

[Follow the tender notice in SAP Ariba: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14632043](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14632043)

**Additional Notes**
------------------

**Bid Submissions**
------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 6, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST on December 6, 2022 will be declared non-responsive.

This announcement on high voltage distribution system divestiture is now completed. Note to the reader: Theirs a huge amount of fluff content that isn't usefull to end users, therefore has been cut to just the key points. This format is professional and format could be curated for future scenarios. Enjoy!
